name: Virtualmin
description: Virtualmin is taking on the lack of innovation in the server admin programs, like Plesk, by making a more accessable version for pages managed by the non-technical crowd. The program will feature simple installs of popular programs like content management systems that often cost extra on other providers. It will also let you administer your website from your desktop and mobile device.
markdown:
raw_markdown="A haven of efficiency and controlfor website management [ Try Virtualmin](http://virtualmin.com/<https:/www.virtualmin.com/download/>)
[TM](http://virtualmin.com/<https:/www.virtualmin.com/>)
  * |


  * [Download](http://virtualmin.com/<https:/www.virtualmin.com/download/>)
  * [Shop](http://virtualmin.com/<https:/www.virtualmin.com/shop/>)
  * [Documentation](http://virtualmin.com/<https:/www.virtualmin.com/docs/>)
  * [Support](http://virtualmin.com/<https:/www.virtualmin.com/support/>)
  * [Forum](http://virtualmin.com/<https:/forum.virtualmin.com/>)
  * [Sign In](http://virtualmin.com/<https:/www.virtualmin.com/account/signin/>)
  * [](http://virtualmin.com/<https:/www.virtualmin.com/search/>)
  * [](http://virtualmin.com/<javascript:;>)
  * [![](http://virtualmin.com)](http://virtualmin.com/<https:/www.virtualmin.com/account/>)


Virtualmin is the leading and most sophisticated web hosting control panel designed for Linux systems. It supports a wide range of Linux distributions, including Debian and Ubuntu, Rocky Linux, AlmaLinux, and RHEL. Available in both a community-supported open-source GPL version and a feature-rich Pro version, providing a cost-effective and efficient solution for web hosting management. It is ideal for web developers, IT professionals, and hosting providers, simplifying server security updates and the deployment of web applications ranging from WordPress to Django to ensure ease of use and a seamless website management experience.
## Virtualmin Features
Virtualmin is a uniquely powerful and flexible web server administration tool. It is unmatched in features and flexibility. Based on Webmin, it offers a wide array of productivity-enhancing tools for hosting providers, web developers, web designers, and end users.
Powerful and flexible domain accounts, allowing users to manage their websites
Manage DNS locally or integrate with external services like Cloudflare, Google Cloud DNS, Amazon Route 53
Manage mailboxes with spam/antivirus protection, forwarders, auto-responders, and aliases, including Amazon SES support
Database management with data export, import, and delegated control for users
Delegate management with domain owner and reseller accounts for fine-grained access control
Enhanced security with two-factor authentication, brute force protection, and many other security features
Log handling, service monitoring, updates alerts, and detailed statistics
Streamlined backup, migration, and cloud storage integration with Dropbox, Google Drive, and Amazon S3
Easily installable web applications, such as WordPress, Joomla, Drupal, phpBB, phpMyAdmin and many others
Manage your server in your browser with SSH-like power and control using interactive terminal
Utilize FirewallD or ConfigServer Security and Firewall for robust server protection
Effortlessly request and deploy free SSL certificates with Let's Encrypt for securing various services
The strength of Virtualmin lies in its minimalistic approach, utilizing the OS's provided software to keep your systems lean. Its non-intrusive nature and respect for your server configurations, along with the ease of migration from cPanel/Plesk and straightforward backup solutions, makes it indispensable.
## Why Virtualmin?
Virtualmin has competition. A lot of it. We even compete with ourselves when it comes to choosing to purchase your tools or select an open-source option. We think we’ve built the most powerful and flexible web hosting control panel in the world in nearly every area.
#### Flexibility where you need it
Virtualmin is unlike anything else, when it comes to flexibility and power. Designed by system administrators for system administrators, it works with you to configure services and accounts in the way you choose.
#### Ease of use where you want it
Virtualmin isn’t just for hard core system administrators. It scales back the complexity of the user interface based on the privileges of the logged in user, and allows delegation of tasks, based on skill and level of trust.
#### Maximize efficiency
Virtualmin has always been focused on automating away repetitive tasks without impeding your ability to customize. Simplifying complex tasks is a Virtualmin specialty.
#### Extensible, scriptable, customizable
Virtualmin was made to be extended, scripted, and customized. With a modular architecture, you can write new modules and themes, drive it from scripts or other programs, and create Server Templates to suit your needs.
#### Command line friendly
With Virtualmin, working from the user interface is not the only way to do it. With complete command line access to nearly all user interface functions, and the ability to configure most services using standard text editors and tools, Virtualmin works your way.
#### Professional support
Virtualmin support is provided by the people who build and maintain the software. When you file a support ticket with us, you’ll receive prompt, expert, advice. Tickets are usually answered within 24 hours, and every member of our staff has years of experience.
Elevate your web hosting experience with Virtualmin today!
[ Try Virtualmin!](http://virtualmin.com/<https:/www.virtualmin.com/download/>)
[ ](http://virtualmin.com/<#top>)
© 2005 - 2025 Virtualmin

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Virtualmin**

Virtualmin is a web hosting control panel that’s primarily focused on providing a superior management experience for Linux systems. Founded as part of Y Combinator’s W07 batch and headquartered in Mountain View, California, the company aims to tackle the stagnation in server administration software by offering more accessible tools for non-technical users.

### Mission
While an explicit mission statement wasn’t provided, it’s evident that Virtualmin is dedicated to innovation in server management, making it easier for website admins—especially those without a technical background—to manage and deploy various web applications.

### What they do
Virtualmin stands out by offering both a free, community-supported GPL version and a premium Pro version of their software, which integrates smooth functionality with a wide array of Linux distributions like Debian, Ubuntu, Rocky Linux, and others. 

The core offering is a powerful control panel that helps web developers, IT professionals, and hosting providers simplify the tasks associated with server management. You can expect features such as:

- **Domain Management**: Create and manage multiple domain accounts easily.
- **DNS Management**: Control DNS settings locally or integrate with services like Cloudflare.
- **Email Management**: Full mailbox control with spam protection, forwarding, and auto-responders.
- **Database Management**: Import, export, and delegate database control.
- **Enhanced Security**: Features like two-factor authentication and brute force protection.
- **Seamless Backups and Migrations**: Integration with popular cloud storage options for backups.
- **Easy Installation of Web Applications**: Quickly install popular content management systems like WordPress and Joomla.

### Unique Features
What really makes Virtualmin compelling is its flexibility and user-friendliness. It caters to both amateur users and seasoned system administrators by adjusting the complexity of the interface based on a user’s privileges. Additionally, being command-line friendly ensures that power users can enjoy a more traditional experience if they prefer.

- **Customizability**: The software’s modular architecture allows for extensions and custom scripts to enhance functionality.
- **Support**: Virtualmin boasts professional support delivered by the developers themselves—tickets are usually answered promptly, usually within a day.

### Why Choose Virtualmin?
In a saturated market with solid competitors, Virtualmin's versatile features, user-centric design, and focus on automation set it apart. It's a tool designed by administrators for administrators, making it both powerful and adaptable for various skill levels.

To give it a try and elevate your web management experience, check out their [website](http://virtualmin.com).

---

In essence, Virtualmin is not just another hosting control panel; it’s an efficient platform designed with both power and simplicity in mind, catering to a wide user base with diverse needs.
